effects.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.  One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
effects.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

moveDescription:
The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam
attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
